title: In Ukraine Crisis, Putin Confounded Diplomatic Efforts by Western Leaders
sub_head: A parade of Western heads of state sought to stop Putin from attacking Ukraine, but they found a leader whose position only hardened
body:
For weeks, a parade of European heads of state sought to prevent Russian President Vladimir Putin from invading Ukraine.
But even as they engaged in a flurry of diplomacy, they found a Russian leader who adopted a steadily harder position, say diplomats, even as he appeared to keep the door open to diplomacy.
